title: The bitter vvaters of Babylon, or The miserable estate of the citizens of Sion considered by the confusion of all things in this world.
author: Forsyth, James, fl. 1615-1619.
publisher: Printed by Edw. Griffin for Ralph Mab, and are to bee sold in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Grey-hound,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
